entry.title: I Converted Book I of The Sequences Into A Zoomer-Readable Format
entry.summary: "What, then, does manage to hold the fickle eyeballs of zoomers like me? Well, TikTok, mostly. However, there is one (very popular) genre of TikTok video worth investigating. In this genre of video, a Reddit post is broken into sub-paragraph chunks of text, and these chunks are sequentially rendered onscreen while a text-to-speech program reads them to the user. The text is overlaid upon a background video, which is either gameplay from the mobile game Subway Surfers, or parkour footage from Minecraft."

entry.title: ForgeFed
entry.summary: ForgeFed is a federation protocol for software forges and code collaboration tools for the software development lifecycle and ecosystem. This includes repository hosting websites, issue trackers, code review applications, and more. ForgeFed provides a common substrate for people to create interoperable code collaboration websites and applications.

entry.title: Activitypub Academy
entry.summary: A fully functioning Mastodon instance that helps you to understand ActivityPub

entry.title: Scotto34 (PCB Edition) Keyboard
entry.summary: The Scotto34 (PCB Edition) is a low-profile 34-key split monoblock ortholinear keyboard that uses 18x17mm spaced Choc switches, hotswap sockets, and an exposed controller in the middle. Uses a raspberry pi pico.

entry.title: Retro Lite CM4
entry.summary: A CM4 gaming handheld, designed with the Switch Lite aesthetics in mind. Contains all STL files and code to build your own landscape retro handheld system.

entry.summary: The world’s cheapest, simplest possible pen-plotter.

entry.title: Geographical Adventures
entry.summary: A work-in-progress geography game about flying and delivering packages to different countries around the world. Made in the Unity game engine.

entry.title: Pico W Air Quality Monitoring w/ PM 2.5 Sensor
entry.summary:
The Pico W Air board is tiny little device that tracks PM air quality. The board has a modular design and you can add additional sensors.
The board supports MQTT with the default firmware so it might be interesting to hook into homeassistant

entry.title: Build your own Game Boy Mini Camera
entry.summary: Created by Christopher Graves - A Game Boy Camera redesigned into the size of a typical Game Boy cart. Forgoing the capability of “selfies”, it has been engineered for a more compact carry.

entry.title: Zelda Ocarina of Time Circuit | Mario Kart 8
The Waluigi Effect - LessWrong
entry.summary: A mechanistic explanation of the Waluigi Effect and other bizarre "semiotic" phenomena which arise within large language models such as GPT-3/3.5/4 and their variants (ChatGPT, Sydney, etc). This article will be folklorish to some readers, and profoundly novel to others.

entry.title: Fediverse Redirector
entry.summary: Redirect any Fediverse app to your favourite one.

entry.title: Install Zerotier on the Steam Deck
entry.summary: Bookmarking this because there's a non-zero chance I'll have to figure out how to set this up again- maybe after the update to 3.5

entry.title: Verbatim: What is a Photocopier?
entry.summary:
In 2010, the Cuyahoga County Recorder's Office in Ohio was sued when it decided to charge $2 per page for photocopies of public documents.
This is a re-enacted scene of a deposition from that court case. The dialogue is presented verbatim.
